DOC.brief_title: Development Patient-Reported Outcome Measure Assess Symptoms Patients With Primary Sclerosing Cholangitis ( PSC )
DOC.detailed_description: In Step I , concept elicitation one-on-one interview ( via telephone person ) conduct . The aim concept elicitation interview : 1 . Identify common symptom , well important symptom , patient PSC , 2 . Assess whether symptoms impact day-to-day function An instrument develop base symptom report Step II study , performance instrument assess interview .
DOC.criteria: Confirmed diagnosis PSC base liver biopsy diagnostic imaging , diagnosis make least three month prior screen Patient report PSC symptom associate PSC diagnosis Able speak , read , understand English Willing able provide write informed consent participate research study Patients cause liver biliary disease , include viral hepatitis , alcoholic liver disease , primary biliary cirrhosis , secondary sclerosing cholangitis Patient history liver cirrhosis Patients history cholangiocarcinoma Patients receive liver transplant Patients currently enrol PSC clinical trial ; STEP II ONLY : Enrolled participated Step I study ( concept elicitation )
